property.description:
Located just 800 metres from Reading Terminal Market in downtown Philadelphia, ROOST Apartment Hotel offers fully-equipped apartments with boutique hotel amenities. Free WiFi access is offered.

Featuring vaulted ceilings, herringbone hardwood flooring and oversized windows, each furnished unit is decorated with Turkmen rugs, custom artwork and living plants. Each unit is also equipped with a full-size kitchen and private bathrooms with Davines toiletries and SFERRA linens and bath towels.

There is a 24-hour front desk, shared roof terrace and weekly housekeeping at ROOST Apartment Hotel. Guests are offered access to free bike rentals, a lending library and The Sporting Club at The Bellevue.

City Hall is 350 metres from ROOST Apartment Hotel, while Avenue of the Arts is only 210 metres away. University of Pennsylvania is 2.3 km from the property.
